titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently exclude from gross income certain reported tips for workers in eligible service sectors, to better support low- and moderate-income earners, and for other purposes.

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to permanently exclude from gross income certain reported tips for workers in eligible service sectors, to better support low- and moderate-income earners, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
